title: Exploring emotions in relation to neighborhood environmental characteristics among older adults with low socioeconomic position: A qualitative study using walk-along interviews
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 149

Author(s): Noortje Jacobs, Benedicte Deforche, Amber Van Puyvelde, Delfien Van Dyck, Lieze Mertens, Jenny Veitch, Jelle Van Cauwenberg
